item.description:
ðŸ“Š Projects #

Relation Between Healthcare Factors and Health Outcomes #

Technologies: Python, SQL

  • Explored global healthcare datasets to identify key disparities and patterns impacting life expectancy and health outcomes.
  • Connected SQL with Python for data cleaning, integration, and normalizationâ€”handling over 1 million rows.
  • Applied statistical tests (T-Test, Chi-Square) to validate hypotheses and built predictive models using Random Forest, Gradient Boosting, and Linear Regression, achieving up to 92.4% accuracy in health outcome prediction.
  • Developed visual dashboards with Tableau and created heatmaps to highlight factor correlations, providing policy-level insights to improve global health outcomes.

Pharmacist Participation in Diabetes Distress Assessment & Self-Management #

Technologies: Excel, SPSS, CRF (Case Report Form)
